ProductInfo.Features:
GW9708SH: Professional 8 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Real-time DVR with HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30FPS recording. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW40WD: Professional 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 66 IR LEDs, 196 ft. IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Vandal proof & water proof. Good for Outdoor and Indoor
Package Includes: GW9708SH DVR with 2TB HDD; GWLED19IN - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor; 6 x GW40WD: 1/3" Effio CCD Camera
1 x GW125CAW: 125 feet pre-made cable BNC;1 x GW100CAW: 100 feet pre-made cable BNC;3 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC;1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC;1 x 12V5A Power Supply For Security Cameras;1 x 1 to 8 Power Splitter Adapter Cable
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 6CHE1 8 Channel H.264 960H and D1 Real-Time DVR with 6 x Effio-E CCD 700 TVL Varifocal Lens 66 IR LEDs Security Camera System, Free LED (White/Silver)
